英文法規名稱: Standards for the Recognition of Owner-Occupied Houses and of the Status of an Individual to Rent Premises for Public-Welfare Purposes
中文法規名稱: 住家用房屋供自住及公益出租人出租使用認定標準
沿革內容:
1.Promulgated by Decree No.10304579390 issued by the Ministry of Finance on June 29, 2014.
2.Amended and Promulgated by Decree No. 106046990303 issued by the Ministry of Finance on November 30, 2017.

Note:
In case of any discrepancy between the English version and the Chinese text of these Standards, the Chinese text shall govern.

法規內容.條文內容: These Standards are enacted pursuant to the provisions of Paragraph 2, Article 5 of the House Tax Act.

Houses leased for public welfare purposes by landlords registered with the local government as a charity, who are determined by the municipality, county, or city competent authority in accordance with the Housing Act and other related regulations, are rented for residential purposes within the validity period of determination.
These Standards shall come into effect from the date of promulgation.
